data.eml:eml: A new “ elfin ” butterfly species of Cissatsuma Johnson, 1992 (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae) from northwestern Sichuan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Krupitsky, Anatoly V. (2018): A new “ elfin ” butterfly species of Cissatsuma Johnson, 1992 (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae) from northwestern Sichuan, China. Zootaxa 4524 (4): 482-488, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.4.5
